config.eliminate.title: Eliminate Configuration
config.eliminate.option.updateSpeed.tool: Adjust the update cycle of surface height detection. Unit is Ticks (1s=20Ticks). Default 20 is update every tick.
config.eliminate.option.syncWithSodium.t: When enabled, culling logic will sync with Sodium's occlusion query frame, providing more precise culling.
config.eliminate.option.fovCullingEnable: Dynamically cull chunks outside the player's real-time Field of View. More precise and aggressive than back-face culling.
config.eliminate.option.aggressiveMounta: Automatically cull surface chunks occluded by thick terrain when underground. Significantly boosts performance in complex terrain.
config.eliminate.option.transparencyAwar: Detect transparent blocks (e.g., water, glass). Chunks with transparency will skip culling to prevent visual flickering.
config.eliminate.option.horizontalCullin: Cull horizontally occluded chunks based on terrain features, skipping chunks blocked by mountains or terrain.
config.eliminate.option.biomeAwareCullin: Adjust culling strategies for different biomes, using more aggressive culling in plains and conservative in complex terrain.
config.eliminate.option.dynamicCullingDi: Automatically adjust culling distance based on current FPS to maintain smooth gameplay.
config.eliminate.option.targetFps.toolti: Set target FPS for dynamic culling. When FPS drops below this, culling distance will increase.
config.eliminate.option.minDynamicDistan: Minimum culling distance for dynamic adjustment, ensuring basic optimization at high FPS.
config.eliminate.option.maxDynamicDistan: Maximum culling distance for dynamic adjustment, preventing excessive impact on gameplay at low FPS.
